name: Sling Puzzle: Golf Master
description:
Have you ever imagined what happens to the world when gravity is not always downward? In an inverted city, you will walk over walls and fall into the sky. Space is no longer limited to flat ground and the movement of things will become truly different. This game constructs a special gravity space. In the game, you will explore in the intricate gravity space, discover golf like movement, break the traps, solve the puzzles, and discover the path to the end.

Roll your character through a maze of challenges, solving puzzles to reach the finish point. Precision and wit will be your allies on this exhilarating rolling adventure!


Crash into the pyramid of cans for a smashing good time in our puzzle arcade game. Roll your way to bonus points as you skillfully break down the pyramid and conquer the challenge!


Roll with precision and master the art of timing to overcome the sophisticated obstacles that lie ahead. Only the most skillful players will conquer this thrilling and demanding test of wit and reflexes!


Take careful aim to hit the pyramid of cans, breaking it with finesse. Show off your accuracy and puzzle-solving prowess in this exhilarating level!

Game Features:

  • Exquisitely designed levels
  • Hundreds of mind-blowing puzzles with hidden paths and well-designed traps
  • Nice and simple sling game, golf mechanics
  • 100% real physics
  • Collect and upgrade various characters and trails
  • Three different game modes
  • Level mode: reach the final point of each level within a limited number of moves
  • Capture mode: no limit on the number of moves, you need to capture all chickens in the shortest time
  • Treasure mode: discover and collect the hidden treasures in the level
  • Comfortable and relaxing music and sound
  • Easy to control, golf mechanics, fun to play
